name: The Last Blaze
description:
-------SUMMARY-------

Defend your campfire from ice monsters by throwing snowballs at them and fuel it with wood to stop it from going out. Build walls and turrets to stop the monsters from dousing your fire. Your survival depends on the heat!

-------CONTROLS-------

Move around with WASD or the arrow keys

Aim by moving the mouse

Left click and hold to charge up a snowball. A bigger snowball does much more damage to enemies but travels a lot slower.

Place a structure with the right mouse button and cycle structures with the scroll wheel

Use Wall and Turret structures to defend your camp fire

Your survival depends on the campfire - If it goes out, you lose. You can respawn as long as your campfire burns (you will lose all the wood you are holding, though)

Move near the campfire to regain health

Watch out - occasionally a super powerful Boss will appear. Make sure you have built sufficient defenses before then.

Pickup wood by walking over it, and move near the fire to deposit it.

If you are experiencing a slow frame rate (game is choppy) you can toggle Fast Mode in the main menu to make your game run much faster with the trade off of being much less pretty.

-------EXTRA INFO-------

Made in 1 week as a Christmas present to my awesome family.

The different versions have a special message for the person in the title.
